name: True Bard
description:
This is game mechanics of turn based rpg based on music theory but there are no requirements for player to know or understand music, tonedeaf people can play, no need good reaction like in most music based games. 

Short description

As in D&D system attributes linked to natural abilities of people. Warrior has big amount Strength, Mage Intellect.  

First attribute of musician is Charisma. You can play instrument badly but if can attact attention of crowd you became musician.

Second is Intellect you know about music a lot and even if you are very shy you can impress people by your performance.

Third Agility you can treat music like sport and train youself to play fast, longer period. This may have affect people like two previous attributes.

Sure you can have balanced character who have a bit of all this attributes and win you road to fame and money)
